title: Episode 6 - Kargo Founder/CEO Harry Kargman & Arkadium CEO/Co-Founder Jessica Rovello
description:
How do startups meet crises with ingenuity? Entrepreneurs on the bumpy road to profitability: take note. 
(Interviewed by Vonnie Quinn)
